name: Totally Amp'd!
description:
Note: This is a large download and requires a wifi connection. Please be patient so that you can enjoy the series :)!

★★★ WINNER OF BEST IN MOBILE APPLICATION DIGI AWARD 2012 ★★★

**********

"Quite simply, if you've got kids who enjoy Disney Channel shows, and the hefty download isn't an issue, you've got nothing to lose by downloading the free Totally Amp'd app..." - USA Today

"…it encourages kids to be creative." - Wired Magazine

**********

* First Ever Made-For-Mobile TV Series!!!!
* Features 10 live-action appisodes starring Cristine Prosperi from Degrassi and Ashley Leggat from Life with Derek!
* Sing along to your favourite songs from the series
* Make your own fashion and dress up the stars from the series
* Make your own music videos to your favourite songs from the show!



Get ready to experience the first interactive TV Show on your device! Totally Amp'd features 10 amazing appisodes and three interactive studios exclusively available in this App!!!! With each Totally Amp’d episode, interactive content is unlocked that turns your device into fun Music, Movie and Design Studios. Join Totally Amp'd by singing and remixing songs, directing music videos, customizing the band's look, designing posters and album covers, and much more!

★★★ Music Studio ★★★ 

The music studio features an amazing karaoke style feature that lets you sing and record your favourite Totally Amp'd songs! Start training your voice, and get ready to sing along to such hit songs as "Round and Round" and "It's Not a Dream." There is also a great music mixer that allows you to control all the instruments, and create your own unique version of each of the songs.

★★★ Movie Studio ★★★ 

Have you ever wanted to help direct and edit a music video? Well here's your chance! Choose the final cuts and help sequence the music videos for your favourite songs from Totally Amp'd! Put your director's cap on and get ready to call all the shots!

★★★ Design Studio ★★★ 

If you consider yourself a fashionista or love design, then this will be your favorite part of the App. You can design clothing and dress up the characters from the show! You can also design posters and other marketing materials to help out Totally Amp'd on their way to stardom.

It's time to get Totally Amp'd!

**********

Check out our other amazing games!! Cows vs. Aliens, Inspector Gadget, Drag Racer World, Ghostbusters™ Paranormal Blast, and Fashion Star Boutique!

**********
